about: I am a support focused software engineer with more than 15 years of experience across application support and web development, much of it spent working with complex, business critical systems. My background has given me a practical, user-centred mindset, with a strong focus on reliability, performance, and solving real problems rather than building solutions in isolation.

employment.description: Delivered a pharmacovigilance web application, using Angular, Java, and Oracle to implement search, administration, reporting, and product management functionality, as a member of a Scrum team.
tasks: Maintained and enhanced Jenkins CI/CD pipelines supporting Docker-based Linux deployments
Improved data export performance and scale through Apache POI optimisation
Designed and implemented Spring Boot microservices with secure, scalable REST APIs
Developed comprehensive Jasmine unit tests to validate and stabilise frontend functionality
Evaluated technical feasibility of new features and participated in structured peer code reviews

employment.description: Provided long term application and database support for a pharmacovigilance platform, resolving complex issues, assisting users, and maintaining high standards of data integrity and system reliability.
tasks: Delivered technical support and user training while efficiently managing support tickets
Implemented system and database improvements to enhance functionality and performance
Produced monthly issue and trend reports to support tracking and operational insights
Developed internal tools and applications to streamline and automate support team workflows
Built a web-based troubleshooting interface to diagnose and resolve customer connectivity issues

employment.description: Provided remote application and hardware support for customers using time and attendance, access control, personnel, and energy management systems; security vetted as non-police personnel by West Midlands Police.
tasks: Configured and supported Microsoft SQL and MSDE databases to ensure reliable system operation
Provided technical guidance to electrical engineers during on-site hardware installations
Performed firmware and software upgrades using secure remote access tools
Supported application server migrations and carried out software installations

employment.description: Delivered first line IT and facilities management support to NHS Strategic Health Authority and Primary Care Trust staff across the Anglia region, gaining experience in user support, account administration, and IT policy compliance.
tasks: Administered Microsoft Windows Active Directory accounts
Managed Microsoft Exchange 2007 accounts via OWA to support community staff
Enforced NHS Trust IT and email policies to maintain compliance and data security
Provided support for Microsoft Office 2003/2007 applications to resolve user issues

employment.description: Supported UK head office and shop staff using Itim retail applications, including out-of-hours, developing expertise in software, hardware, and database management.
tasks: Delivered EFT and EPoS software and hardware support to shop floor and back office teams
Managed EPoS provisioning for new and refitted retail stores
Resolved support requests efficiently using remote access tools, maintaining high service levels
Managed Microsoft SQL and DP4 databases to support reliable application performance

employment.description: Provided IT support for UK and European small and home office customers, while assisting Sales staff with administrative tasks, building foundational skills in customer support, technical troubleshooting, and office systems.
tasks: Provided Microsoft Windows and Office application support to customers
Maintained accurate records of customer requests, incidents, and IT assets
Prepared quotes, invoices, and contracts for scheduled work, supporting sales operations
Advised customers on technical solutions and pre-sales recommendations

employment.description: Produced and baked pastries, bread, and cakes, and baked frozen pies, ensuring consistent quality, hygiene, and safety standards.
tasks: Operated bakery machinery safely and maintained a clean work environment to meet regulations
Managed inventory to ensure consistent ingredient availability and product quality
Collaborated with the team to improve production efficiency and workflow

employment.description: Managed the lifecycle of decommissioned computer equipment, ensuring secure data destruction and preparing devices for resale while maintaining quality standards.
tasks: Processed pallets of printers, monitors, desktop, and notebook computers efficiently
Destroyed data to comply with data protection regulations
Cleaned and refurbished devices to meet quality standards for resale at auction

courses.name: Sports, Recreation and Allied Occupations Leadership

interests: Technology enthusiast with experience using Linux for server and desktop computing, with special interest in security, and open-source software. I develop and maintain self-hosted projects for both personal use, and by a local sports club where I serve on the committee.

My recent projects have focused on PHP, MySQL, Vue.JS and Google Apps Script, and I am currently exploring Cloudflare Workers KV and D1, as well as the Handlebars templating language and HTMX JavaScript library.
